laboratory_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is distended, filled with sludge and stones, and demonstrates gallbladder wall edema. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation is present, with the common bile duct measuring 4 mm. The liver is normal in echotexture without focal hepatic masses. Portal vein is patent demonstrating normal hepatopetal flow. The spleen is normal, measuring 11.7 cm.
NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
